thread.title: You Can Now Sign up to Reserve the adidas YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra”
thread.title_full: You Can Now Sign up to Reserve the adidas YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra”

author: Daniel Pearson
title: You Can Now Sign up to Reserve the adidas YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra”

organizations.name: supreme x nike air more uptempo

text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
The long-awaited YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra” has been added to adidas’ Confirmed app ahead of reservations opening this Wednesday.
The app allows users to sign up and register their desired size and pick-up location, as well as sending a push notification as soon as reservation spots open later this week. The only stipulation is that the user must be within their designated location zone (for example, Berlin or New York) on the day reservations open.
YEEZY BOOST 350 V2. FEBRUARY 25 2017. 
A post shared by adidas Originals (@adidasoriginals) on Feb 19, 2017 at 8:59am PST 

Boasting a stunning black and white Primeknit upper, the “Zebra” YEEZY features the familiar SPLY-350 stripe, only with bold red lettering. The much-loved signature heel tab and Three Stripes’ Boost technology remain in place.
Reservations for the release will be officially available on Wednesday, February 22, with further releases at select retailers on Friday, February 25. Download the app by pressing the button below, and stay tuned for more information.
Download / iOS Download / Android In other sneaker news, the gold Supreme x Nike Air More Uptempo debuts in the NBA dunk contest .
